name: Shoot The Dice (MaiGamesDev)
description:
( Recommended to play in full screen )

<HOW TO PLAY>

    1. Press the Reload Button to Roll The Reload dice to get more ammo.

    2. Press the Aim Button to Roll The Aim Dice for get additional Accuracy.

    3. Press WASD keys to Shoot The Dice!

<Prologue>

    One day you wake up and realize and you're in a daylight space. Where is my home? Where am I? who are thosedice with creepy limbs?

    You know this one thing. Survival is the most important.

    Bring the Gun, and time to Shoot The Dice!
